title: Team Hexa Secures 2nd Runners-Up Position in International Blockchain Olympiad 2023 National Round
description: Team Hexa secured the 2nd runners-up position in the National Round of the International Blockchain Olympiad 2023! Team Hexa, along with Team Minty Blockers and Team Strawhats will represent Bangladesh at the International Blockchain Olympiad 2023 in the Netherlands.

title: Team IUT_সংশপ্তক Grabs 1st Runners-Up Position in CoU-BRACNet Inter University Programming Contest 2023
description:
Team IUT_সংশপ্তক for securing the prestigious 1st runners-up position in the CoU-BRACNet Inter University Programming Contest 2023! Your dedication and sheer brilliance have illuminated our path, and we couldn't be prouder.
We extend our heartfelt gratitude to both the mentors and the talented members, namely Abdullah Abrar, Abid Hasan, and Reaz Hassan Joarder, for their unwavering commitment and remarkable teamwork.
 addition, we commend team IUT_O(n!) for their impressive 23rd position in the top 25, a testament to their outstanding abilities. Our sincere appreciation goes out to mentors and members, Mushfiq Talha, Mir Sayad, and Sakib Ayan, for their remarkable performance.

title: IUT Team 'slowFourierTransform' Secures 8th Place in ICPC Dhaka Regional Contest 2022
description:
Team 'IUT_slowFourierTransform' has secured 8th place (out of 162 teams) in ICPC Dhaka Regional Contest 2022. The team consists of Nafis Faiyaz (cse18), Abid Hasan (cse19), and Abdullah Abrar (ME19).

In the last few contests, the team was lacking that 'one problem' in the last hour. Alhamdulillah, this time they have kept calm and done it.
The other teams have done well and improving every day.

Standing: https://algo.codemarshal.org/contests/dhaka-22/standings

title: IUT GENESIS Emerges as Champion in Inter-University Capture The Flag (CTF) Contest 2023
description:
IUT GENESIS, has become the CHAMPION of Inter-University Capture The Flag (CTF) organized by BUET as part of their CSE Fest. 
120 teams participated in the Qualification from where 30 teams were selected for the on-site final. And we came out victorious in a hard fight with other teams as can be seen from the scoreboard.
Total 4 teams from IUT got selected for the final and 3 of them placed in Top 10! The 6th team (IUT_DECODERS) has 3 members from CSE Batch'21!

title: Team LoAaNa Secures 1st Runner's Up Position in Luna Shamsuddoha DevMania 2023
description:
Team LoAaNa consisting of Ayesha Afroza Mohsin (SWE 20), Lomatul Mahzabin (SWE 20), and Nawsheen Mehereen (SWE 20) successfully achieved the position of 1st runner's up in the Luna Shamsuddoha DevMania 2023 for International Girls in ICT day.
The significance of inclusiveness and equity within the startup industry is highlighted by this event. Having a diverse pool of talented individuals contributes to the emergence of fresh ideas, diverse viewpoints, and varied problem-solving methods.

title: IUT Pixel Crowned Champions of Orbitax SUST SWE Technovent Brain Station 23 Hackathon
description: IUT Pixel consists of MD Sabbir Rahman(CSE'18), Jaber Hossain Pranto(CSE'18), Ibtid Rahman(CSE'18) and Kazi Jarif(CSE'20) have become the Champion of Orbitax SUST SWE Technovent Brain Station 23 Hackathon!

title: IUT GENESIS Triumphs in RIOT Center Flag Hunt 2022
description:
𝗜𝗨𝗧 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗘𝗦𝗜𝗦 has managed to snatch a blazing victory in 𝑹𝑰𝒐𝑻 𝑪𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒓𝒆 𝑭𝒍𝒂𝒈 𝑯𝒖𝒏𝒕 2022, the first-ever onsite CTF tournament organized by CTF Community Bangladesh. IUT GENESIS secured their victory by putting up a formidable fight against competitors bearing names of prestigious institutions. With this achievement, followed by the victory in the 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐂𝐲𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝐃𝐫𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟐, on 24th October, IUT has acclimated the field of Cybersecurity tournaments in Bangladesh.

This achievement is the result of the extreme vigor and meticulous effort of the radiant team members of IUT GENESIS. Imtiaj Sreejon, an astounding faculty member of IUT, led the team of brilliant individuals, Shantanu Rahman (EEE'19), Sumit Alam Khan (CSE’ 19), Kafi Rifat (CSE’ 19)], who made commendable contributions in securing victory in such a highly competitive tournament. Apart from the champion team, IUT had a total of 3 teams qualify for the final round, where the other two secured 8th and 13th place in the tournament, escalating the prestige of IUT in the field of CTF tournaments.

 The CTF, Capture the Flag, tournament was held on the IUB campus on October 29th. The VC of IUB, the HoD-Dept of CSE of MIST, and the President of BASIS were present, among others. The tournament was attended by teams from numerous prestigious universities in Bangladesh as they put up a ferocious competitive environment in the tournament. IUT GENESIS maintaining a fairly leading position in the leaderboard could snatch the top position, securing 2600 points, leaving the runner-up far behind at 2080 points at the very end of the tournament. With such a surge of emotion, IUT GENESIS has yet again affirmed their position as the champions among other teams.

title: IUT Excels in SEC Inter University Junior Programming Contest 2022
description:
IUT_সংশপ্তক (3rd) and IUT_CodeByters (10th) secured positions within the top ten teams in the 'SEC Inter University Junior Programming Contest, 2022'.

An interesting fact is, IUT_CodeByters consists of 3rd semester students.

title: IUT Shines in APICTA Awards 2020-21 with 'AUXILIO' Project
description:
The team became the CHAMPION in the RnD category for their project 'AUXILIO' - A head-mounted mouse for people with upper limb disability in the APICTA Awards 2020-21.

We are immensely proud of our very own Ridwan Kabir, Lecturer - Department of CSE from IUT CSE '13 for the recent achievement in representing Bangladesh and IUT on an international platform with such distinction!

Ridwan Kabir acknowledges his teammates Ishrak Abedin, Rizvi Ahmed, and Saad Bin Ashraf from IUT CSE '16 for their contributions to this remarkable achievement. Dr Hasan Mahmud Sir and Dr Kamrul Hasan Sir were the project's supervisors.

title: IUTians Shine in BASIS National ICT Award 2020
description:
BASIS ICT Award is one of the most prestigious tech awards of Bangladesh that provides recognition to outstanding achievements of individuals, students, entrepreneurs, SMEs and organizations. We are proud to inform you that, IUTians have demonstrated glorious success in the BASIS ICT Award 2020 as well.

Ridwan Kabir (IUT CSE'13, Lecturer, CSE, IUT) has become the WINNER (FIRST RUNNER UP) in BASIS National ICT Award 2020 under the category of Research and Development where he participated with his undergraduate final year thesis titled 'RENOVO: An Orthotic Quantitative Assessment and Visualization System for Hemiplegic Upper Limb Rehabilitation.'

He along with his team achieved the most prestigious award in ICT sector nationally. They are now also eligible for APICTA Award which is to be held in Malaysia later this year. We wish them all the best for their nomination for the APICTA award 2021.

Ridwan Kabir is a member of IUT Systems and Software Lab (SSL) research group. The project was supervised by Mr Hasan Mahmud, Assistant Professor, CSE. It feels great to see our faculties going a step further to positively impact our society creating an example for all of us.

title: IUT IoT Startup 'Bondstein' Clinches Championship in BASIS National ICT Award 2021
description: Bondstein, an IoT start-up found by IUTIANs, has been awarded as the Champion in the IoT category in the BASIS National ICT Award. This makes it their 2nd consecutive championship in a row in the most prestigious award of this country.

title: IUT Students Ha-mim Hamid and Imtiaj Sreejon Triumph in Walton ICT Olympiad 2020
description:
Our student Ha-mim Hamid became the Champion and Imtiaj Sreejon became 2nd Runner up in the first-ever online Walton ICT Olympiad 2020 organised by Robi 10 Minute School.

On their path to glory, they beat 64 thousand students representing top institutions of Bangladesh and won 2 laptops as a signature of their victory.

title: IUT Team 'ReverseFlash' Secures 5th Position in ACM ICPC Dhaka Regional 2018
description:
IUT_ReverseFlash stood 5th among 300 teams in ACM ICPC Dhaka Regional 2018.

Team members of IUT_ReverseFlash are: Zubayet Zaman Zico, Fahim Shahriar Shakkhor and Shahed Ahmed.

title: IUT Team 'Flash' Shines in NCPC 2018
description:
IUT_Flash solved 6 problems and stood 7th among 149 teams in NCPC 2018 held at IUBAT on 4th August 2018.

University wise IUT ranked 3rd among around 75 universities from Bangladesh.

3 other teams from IUT also participated in this contest where 2 of them solved 4 problems and another team solved 2 problems.

title: IUT Teams 'Captivators' and 'Pyromancers' Triumph in AUW ICT Fest 2018
description:
Team Captivators and IUT Pyromancers, brings glory back home in the 4th AUW ICT Fest. Team Captivators consisting of 2nd year CSE students, Raiyan Mahmud , Muhammad Mushfiqur Rahman Ankan and Nahian Muhtasim did justice to their team name by captivating the judges as well as the audience and in the process clinched their very first championship prize and that too on the opposition’s own territory in the ICT4D(ICT for Development) event.
 Huge shout-out to IUT Pyromancers also for being the 1st Runners Up in the same event. IUT Pyromancers was also composed of 2nd year CSE students, Fardin Ahsan , Oishee Taskin, Sadman Muhib Samyo. We would also like to congratulate AUW IT Club on organizing a successful fest.

title: IUT Team 'Arcanine' Crowned Champions of Brand Master 2018
description:
Team Arcanine, champion of Brand Master 2018, a prestigious branding competition of the country, jointly organized by UIU MARKETING FORUM & UIU Career Counselling Centre.

We congratulate Mahin Nur, Mubtaseem Zawad, Zarrin Tasnim, Mubashir Shabab Laskar for exhibiting their own prospective talents of branding and excellent marketing skills through this competition.

title: IUT Team 'Quicksilver' Emerges as 1st Runner Up in LU National ICT Fest 2018 Programming Contest
description:
IUT_Quicksilver consisting of Zubayet Zaman Zico, Shadman Protik and Fahim Shahriar Shakkhor from IUT became 1st Runner Up of the 1st LU National ICT Fest Programming Contest 2018

Furthermore, The other 3 teams from IUT solved 4, 3 and 2 problems which is a very good result.
